# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is truly a game-changer in its category. It's designed to enhance your daily life with its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. Given its exceptional value and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $100. However, to make this opportunity accessible, I'm offering it to you at an introductory price of $95. This exclusive offer is valid for a limited time only. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
